title: i m using pixel 3 xl with pie version , trying to update my phone but can not update after install
content:
PIXEL 3 XL
START UPDATING
AFTER  INSTALLATION  ITS SHOWING  " RESTART"
WHEN RESTART AFTER SHOWING SCREEN WITH "G" THEN HANG THERE FOR MORE THEM HOURS
HAVE 15 GB FREE STORAGE. (NO ISSUE OF STORAGE).
100M WIFI SPEED ( NO INTERNET SLOW PROBLEM).
